body:
I am definitely not an expert of Linux and do need clear directions to install
BSDFViewer1.3_ubuntu_64.tar on a brand new installed Ubuntu in a VirtualBox.

For sure the sudo ./install.sh is not working. I have spend some times to
figure out what is not working and then some times to find a post in which the
full procedure is described. As I haven't found anything, I am now hopping you
can help.

Thanks
Serge
subject: [Radiance-general] Need clear directions to compile BSDFViewer 1.3on Linux 64
